prerequisites.supportedUseCase: Shows detailed information on GitHub accounts, reporting on user access, developer activity, collaborator details, insights on pull requests, and issue summaries by repo.

widgets.title: Which GitHub repos are accessible to outside collaborators?

queries.name: query 1
queries.query:
FIND github_repo AS repo
THAT ALLOWS AS perms
  github_user WITH role="OUTSIDE" AS user
RETURN
  user.displayName,
  repo.displayName,
  perms.adminPermission,
  perms.maintainPermission,
  perms.pullPermission,
  perms.pushPermission,
  perms.triagePermission

widgets.title: Which GitHub repos are accessible to outside collaborators?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND github_repo AS repo
THAT ALLOWS AS perms
  github_user WITH role="OUTSIDE" AS user
RETURN
  tree

widgets.title: What GitHub Apps are installed in my Organization with administration write permissions?
Users that opened PRs during the last 30 days

queries.name: query 1
queries.query:
find User as u that OPENED PR
  with _createdOn > date.now - 30days
return u.displayName, PR.displayName, PR.name

widgets.title: Users that manage a team that are allowed access to a repo

queries.name: query1
queries.query: Find User that MANAGES github_team that allows github_repo return tree

widgets.title: GitHub users that approved a merged pull request

queries.name: query 1
queries.query: find github_user that approved github_pullrequest with merged=true return tree

widgets.title: GitHub users that reviewed a merged pull request

queries.name: query1
queries.query: find github_user that reviewed github_pullrequest with merged=true return tree

queries.name: query 1
queries.query: find github_repo that has github_issue return tree

widgets.title: Medium or greater findings merged by developers with uncompleted security training

queries.name: query 1
queries.query:
Find Finding with numericSeverity > 5
  that has CodeRepo
  that has PR with merged = true
  that opened User
  that is Person
  that is knowbe4_user
  that assigned as task Training
  where task.completedOn = undefined

widgets.title: Which developers have not completed security awareness training and have code merged in the last year?

queries.name: query 1
queries.query:
Find CodeRepo
  that has PR with merged = true
    and updatedOn > date.now - 1 year
  that opened User
  that is Person
  that is knowbe4_user
  that assigned as task Training
  where task.completedOn = undefined

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find github_repo as Repo
that ALLOWS github_user with role = ('OUTSIDE' or 'EXTERNAL') as User
RETURN User.displayName as "Name", User.login as "Login", Repo.displayName as "Repo"
ORDER BY User.displayName ASC

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find github_user with role = ('OUTSIDE' or 'EXTERNAL')
return count(github_user) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find Unique github_repo as Repo
that ALLOWS github_user with role = ('OUTSIDE' or 'EXTERNAL') as User
RETURN  Repo.name as "Repo"
ORDER BY Repo.name ASC

widgets.title: GitHub users with admin permissions to repos

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find github_user as u that allows as a github_repo as r where a.adminPermission = true 
return u.displayName, r.displayName, r.public, r.securityPolicyEnabled
